thread.title: Good price, clean, comfortable, good breakfast
thread.title_full: Good price, clean, comfortable, good breakfast - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Marcioxes
title: Good price, clean, comfortable, good breakfast
text:
I stayed at Farifield Inn/Penn Station for 5 nights with my wife and my 4 years old child. Our room wasn't big size, but enough, there was two twin bads and a great view to the city. The hotel's location is good, close to subway station, to Macy's, to Madison Square Garden and 15 min walking to Times Square. The breakfast was good, with fruits, yorgut, breads, juices, eggs. I will stay at this hotel again when i come back to NYC.
Room Tip: Ask for a high floor and city view See more room tips
